headline: Exclusive-US Export-Import Bank considers $120 million loan for Greenland rare earths project
summary: Critical Metals Corp has received a letter of interest from the U.S. Export-Import Bank for a loan worth up to $120 million to fund the company's Tanbreez rare earths mine in Greenland, in what...

headline: FTAI Aviation: A Roller Coaster Ride In 2025
summary: FTAI Aviation's pivot to MRO and joint ventures lifts shares despite short-seller claims and volatility in 2025. Find out why FTAI stock is a hold.
